onboarding.selectProfileDesc: Select the type of financial management you need. You can create additional organizations later.
onboarding.personalDesc: Track personal income, expenses, budget, debts, and net worth.
onboarding.businessDesc: Manage revenue, costs, operating margins, budget vs actual, and forecasts.

netCashFlow.label: Net Cash Flow
netCashFlow.tooltip: Total money coming in minus total money going out this period.

savingsRate.label: Savings Rate
savingsRate.tooltip: Percentage of your income that you're keeping as savings.

netWorth.label: Net Worth
netWorth.tooltip: Total value of everything you own minus everything you owe.

emergencyFund.label: Emergency Fund
emergencyFund.tooltip: How many months of expenses you could cover with your liquid cash.

budgetVsActual.label: Budget vs Actual
budgetVsActual.tooltip: Comparison of planned spending versus actual spending by category.

revenue.label: Revenue
revenue.tooltip: Total income from primary business operations (sales, services).

cogs.label: COGS
cogs.tooltip: Cost of Goods Sold. Direct costs to produce what you sell (materials, labor, manufacturing).

grossProfit.label: Gross Profit
grossProfit.tooltip: Revenue remaining after subtracting the direct costs of production.

opex.label: OPEX
opex.tooltip: Operating Expenses. Day-to-day costs of running the business excluding production costs.

fixedCosts.label: Fixed Costs
fixedCosts.tooltip: Costs that remain constant regardless of production volume (rent, salaries, insurance).

variableCosts.label: Variable Costs
variableCosts.tooltip: Costs that change proportionally with production or sales volume (marketing, commissions).

ebit.label: EBIT
ebit.tooltip: Earnings Before Interest and Taxes. A measure of operating profitability.

operatingMargin.label: Operating Margin
operatingMargin.tooltip: Percentage of revenue remaining after all operating costs. A key profitability metric.

operatingIncome.label: Operating Income
operatingIncome.tooltip: Profit from core business operations, before interest and taxes.

detracciones.label: Detracciones
detracciones.tooltip: Tax withholding mechanism. Amounts are held as Restricted Cash and used to pay taxes.

restrictedCash.label: Restricted Cash
restrictedCash.tooltip: Cash set aside for a specific purpose, not available for general use (e.g., Detracciones balance).

accrualBasis.label: Accrual Basis
accrualBasis.tooltip: Accounting method where revenue and expenses are recorded when earned or incurred, regardless of when cash is received or paid.

cashBasis.label: Cash Basis
cashBasis.tooltip: Accounting method where revenue and expenses are recorded only when cash is actually received or paid.

forecast.label: Forecast
forecast.tooltip: Financial projection based on assumptions about future revenue growth, costs, and one-off items.

import.dragDrop: Drag & drop your Excel or CSV file here
